question: The tallest dam in Haiti "Peligre Dam" is constructed on which river?
explanation: The Peligre Dam is a gravity dam located on the Artibonite River of Haiti. At 72 m it is the tallest dam in Haiti. The dam was created as a flood-control and an energy-providing measure in the Artibonite River Valley during the 1950s, as part of the Artibonite Valley Agricultural Project. This dam impounds Lake Peligre.
